comment:
* Used to communicate information about what are changing on embedded TaskFragments belonging to
 * the same TaskFragmentOrganizer. A transaction can contain multiple changes.
 * @see TaskFragmentTransaction.Change
 * @hide

variables.name: mTransactionToken
variables.comment: Unique token to represent this transaction.

variables.name: TYPE_TASK_FRAGMENT_APPEARED
variables.comment: Change type: the TaskFragment is attached to the hierarchy.

variables.name: TYPE_TASK_FRAGMENT_INFO_CHANGED
variables.comment: Change type: the status of the TaskFragment is changed.

variables.name: TYPE_TASK_FRAGMENT_VANISHED
variables.comment: Change type: the TaskFragment is removed from the hierarchy.

variables.name: TYPE_TASK_FRAGMENT_PARENT_INFO_CHANGED
variables.comment: Change type: the status of the parent leaf Task is changed.

variables.name: TYPE_TASK_FRAGMENT_ERROR
variables.comment: Change type: the TaskFragment related operation failed on the server side.

variables.name: TYPE_ACTIVITY_REPARENTED_TO_TASK
variables.comment:
* Change type: an Activity is reparented to the Task. For example, when an Activity enters and
     * then exits Picture-in-picture, it will be reparented back to its original Task. In this case,
     * we need to notify the organizer so that it can check if the Activity matches any split rule.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
public void addChange(@Nullable Change change)
methods.comment: Adds a {@link Change} to this transaction.

methods.name: public boolean isEmpty()
methods.comment: Whether this transaction contains any {@link Change}.

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
